segments.text: Suddenly, I notice the water cascading over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a waterfall in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's too busy with her plate to see it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's wet, but she keeps going.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I spot the boy on the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching way up into the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a clever way to get treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's helping by waiting with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles a bit, surprising me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They might crash down with cookies flying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view is serene, totally opposite.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This mix of calm and chaos is unexpected.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't look away from the unfolding scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's full of little surprises everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR
